author:
Nick Schwartz                    

                                    
                        @nick_schwartz
description: Skip Bayless and Shannon Sharpe react to the Eagles' decision to sign LeGarrette Blount.
title: Skip Bayless: Did the Eagles make a mistake by signing a player Bill Belichick didn't want? | FOX Sports

author: Max Meyer
description: After spending the majority of the past four seasons in huddles with Tom Brady and Big Ben, LeGarrette Blount seems eager to work with the newest QB he'll be receiving carries from: Carson Wentz.
title: Blount: Wentz 'has potential to be really special'

author: Kevin Patra
description: Despite averaging just 3.9 yards per carry on 299 totes last season, Eagles GM Howie Roseman believes he just added an engine to his offense in veteran running back LeGarrette Blount.
title: Roseman: Blount 'sets the tempo' for Eagles' offense
